All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasWidgets, IModelListener<T>, IView<T>, Iterable<com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget>
public abstract class Form<T,W extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget>
extends View<T,W>

A form view, which adds initialisation and validation mechanisms.

Method Detail

initForm

public abstract void initForm(T value)
Initialise the form with the value.
Clear the errors.
Keep value instance to avoid creating new instance and keep non displayed value (like an id)

Parameters:
value -

validateForm

protected abstract boolean validateForm()
Validate each field element of the form
Errors are displayed at each field element, or at a top level with an alert.
